Not far from the old Maximal base, An Autobt similar to Tucsons make and ph=
ysical attributes, in black armor, spends some time out doors warming up fo=
r some ninjabot excercises with a session of what is similar to Tai Chi.  H=
e looks up to find Maurader flying off with Lamia, yet had intercepted a co=
m that stated not to do anything and to just let these minions go.  He narr=
ows his eyes still.

" The sooner we do some pest control the better, I'm g=
ettn' sick of those slag balls runn'n the show like they own the place.  On=
e of these days someone's gonna give it right back ta them and I can't wait=
 ta be a fly on the wall when that goes down".

He resumes his Tai Chi exce=
rcises.  He becomes highly focused and works from Tai Chi right into full b=
lown Ninjitsu excercises. He goes through rounds of punch, block, kick and =
aerial maneuvers soon warming up to his usual speed and caliber.

"Ohh yeah=
h, now I'm ready for some action."

He transforms into his SUV mode and get=
s back to the Maximal base.  He reports back to duty, as he arrives, quickl=
y transforming to robot mode even before his tires stop spinning.

"Yo, Leg=
acy, Night Shift here, and he's in the house.  Lemme know what ya want me t=
a do and I'm as good as there."
